source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_001_000<tab>Now listen, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─may I call you <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Well, I will anyway. Before we get started, I want to make it very clear that while you may be the owner, I command the mammets, and as such I demand a considerable sum. I would hate for us to get off on the wrong foot.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_001_000<tab>Bienvenue sur votre Félicité insulaire<var 1D /var>! Les lieux sont encore vides d'ins<var 16 /var>tal<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions, mais nous allons les rendre vivants petit à petit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_001_005<tab>With that settled, beyond this slope lies a clearing that Mistress Tataru believed would serve well as a base of operations. Let us give it a look, shall we?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_001_005<tab>Il y a un espace dégagé un peu plus loin, suivez-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_000<tab>A fine place to set up shop, would you not agree? Yes, I think it will do nicely.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_000<tab>Alors, c'est pas mal ici, non<var 1D /var>? Je recommande d'en faire notre base d'opérations pour la suite.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_005<tab>Now, while it has much potential, this clearing is currently as bare as a white baboon's buttocks. We'll need some form of shelter from the elements if we're to truly make something of the place.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_005<tab>Mais pour ça, il faudrait que l'endroit soit un peu plus chaleureux... Nous aurons besoin d'un lieu de repos protégé de la pluie, si nous voulons travailler plus efficacement.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_010<tab>Mistress Tataru has told me of your exploits, but I think it safe to assume chopping down a tree with your bare hands is outside of your repertoire. Not that I'd ask you to even if you could. We need tools for delicate work of this nature.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_010<tab>La con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion d'un abri nécessite des matériaux assez résistants... Et même si je ne doute pas de votre force, je ne pense pas que travailler à mains nues soit une riche idée...

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_015<tab>As such, the first order of business will be to craft yourself a hatchet. You'll need three palm leaves, and two stones and branches each.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_015<tab>Commençons par fabriquer un outil pour couper les arbres<var 1D /var>! Pourriez-vous me rapporter des palmes, pierres et branches insulaires<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_020<tab>Follow east along the path and make your first foray into the wilderness to procure them. Should you get any funny ideas about exploring the isle and opt to leave me out here to waste in the rain, you will find my twin, the furious furball, waiting here for you instead.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_020<tab>En allant un peu plus loin, vous arriverez au cœur d'une nature abondante. Je suis sûre que vous trouverez les matériaux nécessaires en un rien de temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_025<tab>Before you go, I have something for you. It's called the islekeep's index. It's to help you keep track of your projects here on the island─can't have you running about watering mammets instead of plants...
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_025<tab>Oh, un peu plus et j'oubliais<var 1D /var>! Tenez, prenez ce tableau de gestion. Vous y trouverez de nombreuses in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions nécessaires au développement de l'île, alors gardez-le sous la patte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_030<tab>That should be all for now. Safe travels! I'll be waiting here should you need me. If I've disappeared, it's because I've been mauled by a wild animal, I assure you.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_002_030<tab>Je ne vous retiens pas plus longtemps, les matériaux vous attendent. N'hésitez pas à venir me voir au moindre souci.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_000<tab>The islekeep's index is now available! Access this interface for crucial information regarding the isle.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_000<tab>Le tableau de gestion est désormais disponible<var 1D /var>! Vous y trouverez toutes les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions nécessaires au développement de l'île.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_005<tab>You can now collect materials and more with the Gather mode, which may be enabled by selecting the appropriate icon from the mode section of the islekeep's index.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_005<tab>Le mode “Collecter” est désormais disponible<var 1D /var>! Activez-le depuis le tableau de gestion pour récupérer divers matériaux sur l'île.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_010<tab>For additional information regarding gathering on the isle, access the guide from the islekeep's index.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_010<tab>Consultez l'aide pour plus de détails.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_015<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_015<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_020<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_020<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_025<tab>You may perform all the actions necessary to develop your island sanctuary by utilizing the modes available in the islekeep's index.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_025<tab>Pour effectuer différentes actions sur l'île, comme collecter des matériaux ou capturer des animaux, changez de mode depuis le tableau de gestion.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_035<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_035<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_040<tab>Finally, make use of duty actions, mounts, and modes to become the master of your new domain!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_002_040<tab>Employez-les efficacement pour aménager l'île comme vous le souhaitez et utilisez les différentes fonctionnalités de déplacement pour encore plus de rapidité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_000<tab>Excellent, you've collected everything. We can move on to crafting your very first tool, then: a hatchet.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_000<tab>Vous m'avez apporté ce que je vous ai demandé<var 1D /var>? Super<var 1D /var>! On devrait être en mesure de fabriquer une hache en pierre avec ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_005<tab>While you were out there gathering, you could do little more than scavenge the odd branch here and there from trees, yes? Well, that will all change in just a moment.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_005<tab>Sans aucun outil, vous ne pouvez que ramasser des branches...

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_010<tab>With the hatchet in hand, you may hack away at as many trees as you like to secure raw timber.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_010<tab>Mais avec une hache, couper les arbres et récupérer des rondins seront un jeu d'enfant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_015<tab>The brilliance of the hatchet's design─a design of my own making, mind you─is that even a non-mammet like yourself can craft it with your own two non-mammet hands. Isn't that wonderful?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_015<tab>En plus, cette hache en pierre est très facile à fabriquer, même à la main. Nul besoin d'un appareillage compliqué<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_020<tab>I've uploaded the blueprints for the design to your index. Go on, make the hatchet!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_020<tab>Ne vous en faites pas, je vais vous guider pas à pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_003_000<tab>The craft feature is now available. Access the sanctuary crafting log from the islekeep's index to review the materials necessary to craft an item, and collect said materials to begin.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_003_000<tab>L'atelier est désormais disponible<var 1D /var>! Ouvrez-le pour trouver les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions relatives aux matériaux dont vous avez besoin pour fabriquer divers objets.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_003_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_003_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_003_010<tab>The islekeep's stone hatchet recipe has been added to the sanctuary crafting log. Crafting this tool will allow you to gather logs from trees by cutting them down.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_003_010<tab>Vous avez obtenu la recette de la hache en pierre<var 1D /var>! Utilisez cette dernière pour couper des arbres et obtenir des rondins.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_025<tab>Let me guess: you missed me. That's very sweet, but let's see about getting a roof over our heads, hmmm? You can start by getting palm leaves, stones, and branches to make a hatchet.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_003_025<tab>Explorez l'île pour trouver des palmes, pierres et branches insulaires<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_003_015<tab>Materials can be collected by selecting the Gather mode from the islekeep's index.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_003_015<tab>Utilisez le mode “Collecter” et accédez aux divers points de collecte sur l'île pour y récupérer des matériaux.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_000<tab>What? You expect me to make the hatchet for you? I have bad news: I'm allergic to exertion.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_000<tab>Ouvrez l'atelier et essayez de fabriquer une hache en pierre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_005<tab>Yes, that is indeed a hatchet. With it, you can now collect all the logs you could ever want or need.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_005<tab>Eh bien, vous avez le tour de main<var 1D /var>! Les arbres n'ont qu'à bien se tenir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_010<tab>Let's move on to the next phase: shelter.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_010<tab>Maintenant que vous avez fabriqué votre premier outil, nous pouvons passer à la con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion d'ins<var 16 /var>tal<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_015<tab>That hatchet of yours should be able to cut through even the thick bark of a palm tree. Meaning you can now collect palm logs, a material vital to our soon-to-be-built haven.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_015<tab>Grâce à la hache en pierre, vous pourrez récupérer des rondins de palmiers<var 1D /var>! Ces derniers sont très résistants, rien de mieux pour les con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tions<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_020<tab>The first building we make shall naturally be the most important, as it will be the very foundation of our base of operations. And, seeing as I have a gift for naming things, I think it best we leave matters of nomenclature to myself. I hereby dub this essential facility...the cozy cabin!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_020<tab>Pour commencer, il nous faudrait un abri... Pour tout vous dire, je lui ai déjà trouvé un petit nom<var 1D /var>: la hutte placide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_025<tab>Ugh, my poor back...
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_025<tab>Hop là...

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_030<tab>Goodness, I'm due for a healthy amount of grease after that ordeal. Anyway, I've prepared the land─you'll need to prepare the rest. Check the logboard beside me to review the materials you'll need for the cabin.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_030<tab>Fiou... Et voilà, le terrain est prêt<var 1D /var>! Vous voyez ce panneau de con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>? Vous pouvez y accéder pour vérifier les matériaux dont vous avez besoin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_035<tab>As we're building a <var 1A 02 /var>cabin<var 1A 01 /var> this time, and not a tool, the amount of materials required are a magnitude above what was needed before. Take your time collecting them, if you must...but not too much.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_035<tab>Tout rassembler ne sera pas une mince affaire... Mais rien n'est pressé, vous pouvez prendre votre temps.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_040<tab>In the meanwhile, I'll round up the other mammets in preparation for constructing the cabin, and begin ordering them around. You know, what I do best.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_004_040<tab>Je vais appeler mes compagnons en attendant, un peu d'aide ne serait pas de refus.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_004_000<tab>The construct feature is now available. Access a logboard to review the materials necessary to construct a facility, and collect said materials to build it.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_004_000<tab>La con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion d'ins<var 16 /var>tal<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions est désormais disponible<var 1D /var>! Rendez-vous au panneau avec les matériaux nécessaires pour lancer des con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_004_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_004_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_005_000<tab>If you think I remember all the materials required to make the cabin, you're absolutely correct. But I wrote them all down so I wouldn't have to go through the trouble of listing them. Now, if you'd leave me to rub some grease into my joints...unless you're offering?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_005_000<tab>Vous pouvez vérifier les matériaux nécessaires sur le panneau de con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_006_000<tab>Finally, a place to escape the occasional downpour. It's a bit rough around the edges, I'll give you, but it's home. It's technically <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> home, but why get fussy about the details? Rest your head on the cot, or call your friends over, you're free to use it as you wish.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_006_000<tab>Notre base est fin prête<var 1D /var>! Vous pouvez vous y reposer ou appeler vos amis pour discuter. Considérez-la comme un second chez-vous.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_006_005<tab>I've taken the liberty of calling a few of my own friends over, in fact, and I think you'll find them most charming. They can provide services you will undoubtedly come to find valuable.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_006_005<tab>Mes compagnons s'y trouvent également, je suis sûre qu'ils vous seront utiles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_000<tab>You may access the orchestrion to play your favorite tunes, and exchange various items with the merchants stationed inside the cozy cabin.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_000<tab>La hutte placide est le centre de votre base d'opérations. Vous pouvez y échanger les matériaux de l'île contre des assignats insulaires ou encore utiliser l'orchestrion pour changer de musique.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_005<tab>Seafarer's cowries may be earned by realizing visions, developing the isle, and performing various activities within your island sanctuary.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_005<tab>Les assignats insulaires azur s'obtiennent par exemple en remplissant les objectifs de développement.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_010<tab>Islander's cowries may be earned by selling materials in your isleventory to the enterprising exporter in the cozy cabin.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_010<tab>Les assignats insulaires émeraude s'obtiennent en échangeant vos biens insulaires à Laracheteuse, à la hutte placide.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_015<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_015<tab>Certains matériaux de valeur peuvent lui être échangés contre des assignats insulaires bleus.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_020<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_020<tab>Les ins<var 16 /var>tal<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions sont désormais disponibles<var 1D /var>! Accédez au menu correspondant depuis le tableau de gestion pour vérifier les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions de votre base.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_025<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_025<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_035<tab>Friends, free company members, and party members may now visit your island. Decide who may or may not enter your sanctuary by accessing Sanctuary Settings from the islekeep's index.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_035<tab>Vos amis peuvent désormais se rendre sur votre île<var 1D /var>! Accédez aux paramètres depuis le tableau de gestion pour choisir à qui vous permettez de la visiter.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_040<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_040<tab>L'orchestrion est désormais disponible<var 1D /var>! En y accédant depuis votre base, vous pouvez choisir quelles musiques vous désirez écouter. Seul le pro<var 16 /var>prié<var 16 /var>taire de l'île peut changer de morceau.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_045<tab>As development of your island sanctuary progresses, you will earn two types of cowries.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_045<tab>En effectuant du commerce sur l'île, vous pourrez obtenir deux types d'assignats insulaires.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_050<tab>With no further ado, go and see the cozy cabin for yourself!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_006_050<tab>Rendez-vous à la hutte placide afin de vous fa<var 16 /var>mi<var 16 /var>lia<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>ser avec les lieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_007_000<tab>As you may have noticed for yourself already, this island receives a dreadful amount of sunlight. I expect that's desirable for growing crops.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_007_000<tab>Au fait, je viens d'avoir une excellente idée. Ne pensez-vous pas que le climat sur l'île soit propice à l'agriculture<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_007_005<tab>If cultivation is your sort of thing, I suggest you speak with my subordinate, the produce producer. You'll find the indolent oaf no doubt loitering about north of here, finding some excuse not to do any sort of work. A privilege reserved solely for myself.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_007_005<tab>Rodolfermier, un de mes compagnons présents sur l'île, s'y connaît justement dans ce domaine. Je vous conseille de vous renseigner auprès de lui.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_007_000<tab>The cropland may now be unlocked! Speak with the produce producer in the north of the hideaway to begin your aspirations as a farmer.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_007_000<tab>Les terres arables sont désormais disponibles<var 1D /var>! Adressez-vous à Rodolfermier, au nord de votre base, pour plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_008_000<tab>What? You're still here? I'm rather keen to have a nap, and I'd prefer if you did not catch me sleeping in your cot. Don't you think you'd be more comfortable away from here, being tormented by the merciless sun as you tend to some crops?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_008_000<tab>Adressez-vous à Rodolfermier, un peu plus au nord, si vous souhaitez vous essayer à l'agriculture.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_009_000<tab>I don't know why I've been reduced to a messenger─I do believe the role is better suited to the curious courier over there─but here we are. The produce producer claims he has something to give you, so I suggest you go find out what it is.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_009_000<tab>Rodolfermier aimerait vous remettre quelque chose<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_010_000<tab>You're back already? If you've questions about the cropland, I am not your mammet. Speak with the produce producer, and allow me to have some peace and quiet.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_010_000<tab>Rodolfermier est celui qui s'y connaît le mieux en agriculture, ici. C'est à lui qu'il faut vous adresser si vous avez besoin de conseils.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_013_000<tab>It's been all of five minutes and you've already had your fill of tilling the land? What a productive little bee you are. Would that I had you under my employ. Anyway, let me think of another way to make, erm, constructive use of your time... Say, do you like animals?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_013_000<tab>Je vois à votre mine réjouie que tout s'est passé pour le mieux. Ne sous-estimez pas l'utilité de vos récoltes, elles pourront vous servir de fourrage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_013_005<tab>Why did I bother to ask? Of course you do. You'll surely make fast friends with the creature comforter, another subordinate of mine, and one who prefers the company of animals more than its own kind. You'll find the curious fellow standing across from the produce producer.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_013_005<tab>Puisque vous avez de quoi les nourrir, pourquoi ne pas vous essayer à l'élevage d'animaux<var 1D /var>? Il faudra un pâturage pour cette activité, et le maître en la matière, c'est Béberger. Je suis sûre qu'il sera ravi de vous en apprendre davantage.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_013_000<tab>The pasture may now be unlocked! Speak with the creature comforter in the north of the hideaway to advance your aspirations as a farmer.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_013_000<tab>Le pâturage est désormais disponible<var 1D /var>! Adressez-vous à Béberger, au nord de votre base, pour plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_014_000<tab>...If you're lost, I suggest you seek out the creature comforter. You will find it in the north of the hideaway, standing across from the produce producer.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_014_000<tab>Adressez-vous à Béberger, un peu plus au nord, si vous souhaitez vous essayer à l'élevage.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_015_000<tab>The creature comforter claims it has something to give you─please go find out what it is before I am subject to its contact again. I swear, if another mammet asks me to give you a message, I will throw them in the wilds myself.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_015_000<tab>Béberger aimerait vous remettre quelque chose<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_016_000<tab>I do not know the first, last, or any of the things in-between about animals, besides that they are ghastly dangerous. Reserve all questions about them for the creature comforter, if you please.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_016_000<tab>Béberger est celui qui s'y connaît le mieux en élevage, ici. C'est à lui qu'il faut vous adresser si vous avez besoin de conseils.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_020_000<tab>You've finished with the pasture already!? V-Very good, very good! Let's see, perhaps next you can find a use for all the materials you'll be getting from the animals and cropland? We could make a workshop, and craft...um, isleworks handicrafts! That's a fine name as any!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_020_000<tab>Tout semble s'être une nouvelle fois passé à merveille. Grâce au pâturage, vous pourrez obtenir de nombreux matériaux et ainsi produire des biens propres à l'île<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_020_005<tab>Lest you worry, you need not concern yourself with the crafting. Nay, I'll make my subordinates do it. I enjoy watching them suffer.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_020_005<tab>Mais pour ça, il nous faudrait une fabrique. Ne vous inquiétez pas pour la main-d'œuvre, mes compagnons se feront une joie de vous assister.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_020_010<tab>We're awfully pressed for space as it is, so we'll need to clear away the trees around here in order to build a workshop.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_020_010<tab>Mais avant, nous aurons besoin d'un nouveau terrain.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_020_015<tab>For all matters concerning the wanton destruction of plant life and vegetation, the pathological pathfinders are the mammets for the job.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_020_015<tab>Adressez-vous à Dédéfricheur I, il saura vous aider.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_020_000<tab>The hideaway may now be expanded! Speak with the pathological pathfinder mk. I to get started.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_020_000<tab>Un nouveau terrain peut être construit<var 1D /var>! Pour ce faire, adressez-vous à Dédéfricheur I, au centre de votre base.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_020_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_020_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_021_000<tab>Pardon me, afraid I'm on a break. Yes. A break. Someone else around here can give you something to do for a change, damn it.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_021_000<tab>Adressez-vous à Dédéfricheur I si vous souhaitez obtenir un nouveau terrain.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_022_000<tab>Look, I completely understand if you're alarmed by our utterly deranged pathfinding friend here. But? There is no but. That's all I wanted to say.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_022_000<tab>Adressez-vous à Dédéfricheur I si vous souhaitez construire une fabrique.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_025_000<tab>I'm pretty sure the pathfinder's looking for you. I would appreciate it if you see what the lunatic wants before it topples the cabin out of sheer bloody-mindedness.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_025_000<tab>Dédéfricheur I aimerait vous parler.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_026_000<tab>Ah, this once-lush land has at last begun to look like proper civilization. Away with the trees, the bugs, the sunlight, and the sights I say! Let there be bricks and buildings and subjects to be exploited!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_026_000<tab>J'ai eu vent de vos efforts quant à l'aménagement de l'île et je crois qu'on peut dire que vous maîtrisez par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment les bases.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_026_005<tab>...Ahem. I think it is about time I retired to the cabin. Now, you may capture wild animals, sow seeds, and remove what vegetation abides on this isle to build wondrous mammet-made edifices in its stead.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_026_005<tab>Maintenant, vous pouvez progresser à votre rythme. Agriculture, élevage, con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tions... Vous avez l'embarras du choix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_026_010<tab>Since I trust each one of those pathfinder units just about as far as I can throw them, I will tell you this myself just in case: should you wish to begin production of craftworks, speak with the tactful taskmaster.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_026_010<tab>Vous êtes peut-être déjà au courant, mais c'est Bernartisan qu'il faut trouver pour produire des biens insulaires. Je suis sûre qu'il vous sera d'une grande aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_026_015<tab>If you have any further questions or experience any trouble, I encourage you to review the islekeep's index. I made it for precisely such occasions, after all.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_026_015<tab>Confiez-vous à moi si vous avez le moindre problème<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_026_000<tab>Congratulations! You have unlocked all of the key features available in the island sanctuary. Now, you are free to cultivate the land as you see fit, and create the island paradise of your dreams!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_026_000<tab>Fé<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions<var 1D /var>! Vous avez débloqué les fonctionnalités es<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tielles de la Félicité insulaire<var 1D /var>! Tout est désormais entre vos mains. Aménagez l'île comme bon vous semble et à votre rythme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_027_000<tab>I must say, I love what you've done with the place. Look how many buildings there are! I feel right at home. Anyway, the curious courier told me to tell you it has a message for you. The irony seems lost on the half-wit. It has one job. Just the one!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_027_000<tab>Le paysage a bien changé depuis notre arrivée, les bâtiments poussent comme des champignons<var 1D /var>! Au fait, Mélissagère aimerait vous parler, allez la voir lorsque vous aurez un peu de temps.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_027_005<tab>Don't worry, I'll keep watch over the island when you have adventuring business to attend to. You'll want to check in with the tactful taskmaster regularly, however, if you wish to keep the production line moving.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_027_005<tab>N'hésitez pas à faire un tour sur l'île entre deux aventures<var 1D /var>! Et conseil d'amie, confier la production de biens insulaire à Bernartisan facilitera votre progression<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_027_000<tab>Earn island experience while in your island sanctuary by performing various actions, such as gathering, gardening, and capturing animals.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_027_000<tab>Effectuer diverses actions sur l'île telles que collecter des matériaux, s'occuper de vos champs ou capturer des animaux, permet d'obtenir de l'expérience insulaire.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_027_005<tab>See your island flourish by increasing your sanctuary rank and engaging in activities.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_027_005<tab>Augmentez votre rang insulaire pour avoir accès à de nouveaux éléments et ainsi aménager votre île comme vous le souhaitez.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_027_010<tab>Do be sure to visit when you can find the time to spare from your adventures. There is much and more to be done!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_027_010<tab>Passez donc ici de temps en temps, entre deux aventures, d'accord<var 1D /var>? Il faut savoir se ménager, c'est important<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_027_015<tab>It still feels altogether too <var 1A 02 /var>green<var 1A 01 /var> for my tastes. Aren't there any plots you can fill with a structure? That'll surely liven up the place.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_027_015<tab>Dites, vous ne trouvez pas que certains terrains mériteraient mieux que d'être laissés en plan<var 1D /var>? Les poupées magiques adorent les édifices en tout genre, surtout lorsqu'ils permettent de s'amuser après une dure journée de labeur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_028_000<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_028_000<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_028_005<tab>You've made superb progress with the hideaway, I must say. Very fine work. I suppose this is as good a time as any to teach you the recipe for crafting an iron hatchet.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_028_005<tab>Vos efforts ont porté leurs fruits, cette île est de plus en plus développée. Vos talents ne cessent de m'impressionner. Laissez-moi vous expliquer comment fabriquer une hachette en fer de pionnier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_028_010<tab>With the iron hatchet, you'll be able to acquire new types of materials from the trees around here. You probably could have used one before, it's true, but I wasn't about to suggest it without taking full measure of your character first.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_028_010<tab>Avec ce nouvel outil, vous pourrez collecter encore plus de matériaux en coupant les arbres de l'île<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_028_015<tab>Other mammets may be content to be murdered in their sleep─or while awake, in many cases─but not I. Which is all to say...mind where you swing that thing. I'll be watching.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_028_015<tab>N'oubliez pas de venir de temps en temps sur votre Félicité insulaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_028_000<tab>The islekeep's iron hatchet recipe has been added to the sanctuary crafting log. Crafting this tool will allow you to gather new types of materials from trees.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_028_000<tab>Vous avez obtenu la recette de la hachette en fer<var 1D /var>! Utilisez cette dernière pour couper des arbres et obtenir de nouveaux matériaux.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_029_000<tab>Ah, welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Taking a rest from your adventures, I take it?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_029_000<tab>Entre deux aventures, prenez le temps de vous reposer ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_029_005<tab>You have the look of an experienced pioneer about you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I look forward to seeing what you accomplish here next.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_029_005<tab>Oh, vous êtes devenu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> véritable expert<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> du développement<var 1D /var>! Profitez bien de votre Félicité insulaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_029_010<tab>By the way, the curious courier, exhaustingly excitable as ever, has told me to tell you that it has once again received a message from Mistress Tataru.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_029_010<tab>Mais au fait, Melissagère a des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions à vous partager. Vous devriez aller lui parler.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_029_015<tab>I see nothing to criticize...for the present. Should you want for inspiration, however, consider expanding your horizons. Explore the isle─explore your hideaway. You may gain some insight as to how to move forward with your development efforts.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_029_015<tab>Alors, le développement de votre Félicité se passe comme prévu<var 1D /var>? Prenez le temps de faire le tour de vos diverses con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tions, et ça vous donnera une bonne idée de la marche à suivre pour la suite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_030_000<tab>You've made astonishing progress with the development of your island in record time. What's your secret? Mammets, isn't it?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_030_000<tab>Le développement de votre Félicité insulaire est en très bonne voie. N'oubliez pas de repasser par ici de temps en temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_030_005<tab>Oh good, you're here. Something in the mossy mountains has been wailing intermittently as of late, and not in a good way either.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_030_005<tab>Certains de nos collègues ont entendu dans la montagne les cri d'un animal inconnu.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_030_010<tab>Seeing as it is your solemn duty to ensure your workers aren't mauled by wild animals, perhaps you'd be so kind as to find the source of that unnerving noise?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_030_010<tab>Je me demande si une nouvelle espèce de créature a élu domicile dans les parages... Vous êtes bien mieux équipé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> que nous pour gérer les monstres, vous voulez bien aller inspecter les environs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_031_000<tab>Did you discover what's been moaning in the mountains yet? No? Then why are you still here?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_031_000<tab>Je compte sur vous pour aller inspecter ce qui se trame dans la montagne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_032_000<tab>A cavern, you say? That wasn't in the paperwork... I suppose it wouldn't hurt to open up the mountain. We might even find something shiny down there.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_032_000<tab>Merci d'avoir été jeter un œil<var 1D /var>! Dire qu'une caverne se cache derrière les rochers, voilà qui est inattendu<var 1D /var>! Il ne reste plus qu'à trouver un moyen d'ouvrir un passage à présent...

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_032_005<tab>It just so happens that we have a mammet fixated on drilling into the earth, so I'll send it over to oversee the excavation. Try not to get crushed in a landslide or something, yes? You people are entirely too fragile.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_032_005<tab>Je vais envoyer un d'entre nous sur place. Hmm, Édouarpenteur devrait être tout désigné pour cette tâche<var 1D /var>! Retrouvez-le directement là-bas, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_033_000<tab>There's a mammet waiting for you by your so-called cavern. While you're obviously free to do what you'd like, you should know that I strongly dislike a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who keeps <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> workers waiting.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_033_000<tab>Édouarpenteur vous attend près de l'endroit dont vous m'avez parlé<var 1D /var>! Voyez directement avec lui comment ouvrir un passage vers la caverne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_034_000<tab>Well? Did you bring me something shiny? ...You haven't even started excavation yet, have you? <sigh>
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_034_000<tab>Au fait... Édouarpenteur vous attend toujours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_035_000<tab>Oh dear, you must be exhausted having crafted such a tiny set of tools to help your employees open that massive mountainside. Would you like me to fetch you a cooling beverage? Because I won't.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_035_000<tab>Ah, vous revoilà<var 1D /var>! Édouarpenteur m'a raconté vos péripéties<var 1D /var>! Excellent travail avec les outils de forage, d'ailleurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_035_005<tab>I'm sure the materials you find in that cavern will prove useful for island development. The shiny ones will be especially nice when they're polished and gifted to the adorable feline mammet who oversees your island while you are off gallivanting and cavorting and fishing and mining and crafting and gathering and dueling and primping and hunting and selling and sightseeing and collecting those fiddly little tomestones and doing whatever else it is that you adventurers spend so much of your precious time doing. Just a thought.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_035_005<tab>Je suis persuadée que les ressources cachées dans cette grotte devraient vous permettre de développer encore plus votre Félicité insulaire<var 1D /var>! À vous d'en tirer parti de la meilleure façon qui soit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_000<tab>Hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Enjoying the island breeze, I trust?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_000<tab>Vous faites une petite pause entre deux aventures<var 1D /var>? N'oubliez pas le développement de votre Félicité, enfin... si le cœur vous en dit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_005<tab>Why, our foundations have flourished into something quite spectacular! It's all thanks to your unflagging leadership. And mammets, of course. Leadership never laid a brick in its life.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_005<tab>Formidable<var 1D /var>! Je me rappelle encore de nos premiers pas ici. Cette clairière était encore envahie par la végétation<var 1D /var>! Regardez comme votre base s'est agrandie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_010<tab>But I think I speak for all of us when I say that we are truly grateful to be here instead of standing abandoned in a broom cupboard or being repurposed into birdhouses. We enjoy earning our keep.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_010<tab>Vous avez accompli un travail formidable ici – avec l'aide de mes compagnons, je l'entends. Mais sans vos in<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tions pour aménager cette île, et votre capacité innée à amasser les ressources nécessaires, nous serions toujours au point mort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_015<tab>And speaking of earning one's keep─or lack thereof, in this case─the curious courier wants to speak with you regarding an urgent message. A message so urgent, in fact, that it will do naught to convey it unless <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> initiate the conversation.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_015<tab>Oh, et avant que je n'oublie... Mélissagère vous cherchait<var 1D /var>! Je pense qu'elle souhaite vous transmettre un message.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_020<tab>It still feels altogether too <var 1A 02 /var>green<var 1A 01 /var> for my tastes. Aren't there any plots you can fill with a structure?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_036_020<tab>Dites, vous ne trouvez pas que certains terrains mériteraient mieux que d'être laissés en plan<var 1D /var>? Les poupées magiques adorent les édifices en tout genre, surtout lorsqu'ils permettent de s'amuser après une dure journée de labeur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_037_000<tab>Thanks to you─but mostly us─this island has become a lovely location for rest and relaxation. Congratulations on your good fortune, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! May it last.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_037_000<tab>Votre Félicité insulaire n'a pas usurpé sa réputation de petit coin de paradis<var 1D /var>! Revenez quand vous le souhaitez pour passer du bon temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_037_005<tab>Ah, impeccable timing. I've just received word from the determined digger who has asked for assistance in the mountain hollow. Seeing as I'm not likely to tromp across the wilderness to oblige it, I thought you might. Because that's what you do.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_037_005<tab>Il semble que la caverne croulante recèle encore quelques secrets... Édouarpenteur souhaite vous faire part de ses dernières découvertes, alors retrouvez-le sur place<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_038_000<tab>Run along, then. Go and assist the determined digger with its...determined digging, I suppose.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_038_000<tab>Si c'est Édouarpenteur que vous cherchez, il se trouve dans la caverne croulante<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_039_000<tab>A crystal-bearing spriggan, you say? ...Well, that sounds quite promising. I expect you to spare no effort in discovering this hidden chamber brimming with priceless gems.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_039_000<tab>Merci d'avoir accepté d'aider ce cher Édouarpenteur.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_040_000<tab>Have you discovered anything regarding this theoretical cavern of crystals? Then would you kindly report to the determined digger? Immediately?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_040_000<tab>Édouarpenteur vous attend dans la caverne croulante.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_041_000<tab>Making steady progress in gaining access to the hidden cavern, I trust?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_041_000<tab>Édouarpenteur vous attend dans la caverne croulante.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_042_000<tab>Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The determined digger has told me all. To think a cavern replete with gleaming, glittering crystals was right under our noses!
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_042_000<tab>Vous revoilà<var 1D /var>! Édouarpenteur m'a raconté vos aventures souterraines<var 1D /var>! Dire que le fond de la caverne abritait un filon de cristaux... étonnant, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_042_005<tab>Such a precious resource could be used any number of ways─like making this cozy cabin a touch cozier for your mammets? Give it some thought, won't you?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_042_005<tab>Avec ces nouveaux matériaux à disposition, vous allez pouvoir améliorer davantage les édifices de votre Félicité insulaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_000<tab>What will it be today? Out to capture more animals for the pasture? Perhaps do a bit of gardening? It matters very little to me, but I suppose I can feign interest.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_000<tab>Passez donc ici entre deux aventures pour continuer le développement de l'île<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_005<tab>Do you remember the very first day we arrived on this island, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I certainly do. The hideaway was overgrown with lush vegetation. Yet look at it now─trimmed and trampled and tamed into a vision of civility.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_005<tab>C'est incroyable, ce qu'est devenue cette base<var 1D /var>! Et dire qu'hier encore, ce n'était qu'une grande étendue d'herbe sauvage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_010<tab>We ought to pat ourselves on the backs for such good work. And I emphasize “we” because it was only through our combined efforts that anything managed to get done around here.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_010<tab>Merci d'avoir fourni autant d'efforts pour aménager cette île. Je compte sur vous pour continuer de plus belle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_015<tab>Speaking of getting things done and those incapable of doing so─the curious courier is making that infernal racket again. I'm assuming you know what that means.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_015<tab>Mais au fait... Mélissagère vous cherchait<var 1D /var>! Je pense qu'elle souhaite vous transmettre un message.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_020<tab>Renovate, renovate, renovate! The key to efficiency is ensuring all facilities are in prime condition, and I fear the hideaway is running dreadfully inefficiently.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_043_020<tab>Rénover vos édifices, c'est la clé du développement<var 1D /var>! Ne laissez pas certains dans leur état de base, sinon ils n'augmenteront jamais leur rendement ni leur efficacité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_000<tab>You like <var 1A 02 /var>wealth<var 1A 01 /var>, don't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Then I have glad tidings for you.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_000<tab>J'ai une requête un peu par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re pour vous.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_005<tab>Word of our esteemed handicrafts has spread beyond the Rhotano Sea, and a number of buyers have indicated their interest in purchasing our goods wholesale.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_005<tab>Il semble que les produits de cette île font parler d'eux aux quatre coins du monde... D'ailleurs, d'autres clients souhaiteraient également que nous leur fournissions des biens insulaires, et je compte bien accéder à leur demande.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_010<tab>Fulfilling these new requests─and thereby increasing our profits so you may pamper your hardworking employees─will require your cooperation, however. Consider it a favor to me.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_010<tab>Si jamais vous êtes intéressé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, je vous enverrai des commandes spécifiques dans le planificateur de la fabrique.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_015<tab>Each term, I will provide you a list of goods, and you will procure said goods by the deadline I give you. Simple enough, no?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_015<tab>Évidemment, les produits les plus prisés risquent de changer en fonction des envies de la clientèle, mais je ne m'inquiète pas, vous avez déjà su proposer une grande variété de biens.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_020<tab>And, should you prove yourself diligent at scratching my back, I might be inclined to scratch yours. A favor rendered ought to be a favor received, after all.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_044_020<tab>Si vous acceptez de m'aider, j'aurais des petites récompenses rien que pour vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_044_000<tab>You can now review the felicitous favors available each season by speaking with the felicitous furball.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_044_000<tab>Vous pouvez désormais recevoir des requêtes de biens insulaires de la part de Chamoiselle.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_044_005<tab>Earn felicitous tokens by speaking with the felicitous furball after completing a felicitous favor, which can be accomplished by shipping the requisite amount of handicrafts within a designated season.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_044_005<tab>Fabriquez la quantité requise avant la fin de la saison pour compléter la mission et recevoir des avoirs de Chamoiselle.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_044_010<tab>Felicitous tokens may be exchanged at the horrendous hoarder's shop for various items.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_044_010<tab>Vous pourrez les échanger contre des récompenses auprès de Marchandréa.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_044_015<tab>Please note that felicitous tokens earned during the previous season must be retrieved by the end of the current one. Tokens earned prior to the previous season cannot be retrieved.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_044_015<tab>Attention, vous ne pourrez récupérer que les récompenses pour les objectifs de la saison en cours et celle la précédant. Toutes les récompenses des saisons antérieures seront perdues.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_000<tab>It seems you've grown uncomfortably attached to the tokens I've given you. I'm afraid you'll need to exchange them with the horrendous hoarder before I give you any more.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_000<tab>Ah, vous ne pouvez plus stocker d'avoirs... C'est gentil de vous dévouer autant pour moi, mais songez tout de même à dépenser votre dû chez Marchandréa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_005<tab>Wonderful, you completed my favor. Now I suppose I can favor you with something in return.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_005<tab>Merci d'avoir fabriqué les biens que je vous ai suggérés. Voici votre récompense<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_010<tab>Impressive work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Here is your reward for completing all my favors last season.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_010<tab>Merci d'avoir terminé mes requêtes spéciales<var 1D /var>! Vous avez fabriqué tous les biens que je souhaitais obtenir lors de la saison dernière. Je vais devoir vous couvrir d'avoirs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_015<tab>I'm pleased to see you take your work so seriously, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Accept this reward for completing all of my favors this season.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_015<tab>Merci d'avoir fabriqué les biens que je vous ai suggérés. Vous avez produits tout ce que je souhaitais obtenir pour cette saison. Soyez prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à finir enseveli<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> sous les avoirs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_020<tab>You just fulfilled all my favors from the past <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> seasons! Now that deserves quite a handsome reward indeed.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_020<tab>Merci d'avoir terminé mes requêtes spéciales<var 1D /var>! Vous avez fabriqué tous les biens que je souhaitais obtenir lors de la saison dernière, mais aussi pour cette saison<var 1D /var>! Incroyable, il va falloir préparer une montagne d'avoirs pour vos récompenser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_045_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_045_000<tab>Que voulez-vous faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_Q1_045_000<tab>Review felicitous favors.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_Q1_045_000<tab>Consulter les requêtes de Chamoiselle

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_Q1_045_005<tab>Talk.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_Q1_045_005<tab>Discuter

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_Q1_045_010<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_Q1_045_010<tab>Rien en particulier

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_025<tab>Time to spare, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Then do consider doing me a few favors. You have nothing to lose except for <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> favor─which we both know means much on this island.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_045_025<tab>J'espère que vous continuerez à passer sur votre Félicité de temps à autre. Et n'oubliez pas de jeter un œil à votre fabrique, j'ai quelques commandes spéciales à vous soumettre.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_045_005<tab>Earn felicitous tokens by speaking with the felicitous furball after completing a felicitous favor, which can be accomplished by shipping the requisite amount of handicrafts within a designated season.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_045_005<tab>Fabriquez la quantité requise de biens insulaires requis par Chamoiselle avant la fin de la saison pour compléter la mission et recevoir des avoirs.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_045_010<tab>Felicitous tokens may be exchanged at the horrendous hoarder's shop for various items.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_045_010<tab>Vous pourrez les échanger contre des récompenses auprès de Marchandréa.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_045_015<tab>Please note that felicitous tokens earned during the previous season must be retrieved by the end of the current one. Tokens earned prior to the previous season cannot be retrieved.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_045_015<tab>Attention, vous ne pourrez récupérer que les récompenses pour les objectifs de la saison en cours et celle la précédent. Toutes les récompenses des saisons antérieures seront perdues.

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_100_000<tab>A friend of the owner, are you? Tell me, how do you find the cabin? Cozy? Yes, I bet you do.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_NEKOMIMI_100_000<tab>Bienvenue sur cette île sans nom<var 1D /var>! J'espère que vous y passerez un agréable moment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_200_000<tab>When at a loss as to how to progress, speak with the felicitous furball for hints about how to realize your current vision.
target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_SYSTEM_200_000<tab>Lorsque vous ne savez pas comment faire progresser le développement de votre Félicité insulaire, n'hésitez pas à demander conseil auprès de Chamoiselle.

target: TEXT_CTSMJIMISSION_00791_Q1_200_000<tab>Demander conseil sur le développement de la Félicité insulaire
